text: Tridrepana hainana is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Hong-Fu Chu and Lin-Yao Wang in 1988. It is found in Hainan, China. Adults are similar to Tridrepana crocea, but can be distinguished by the male genitalic features. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1988 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of China
title: Tridrepana hainana
